abstract: Stocks meandered to a flat close Monday, as investors sought shelter in the traditional havens of gold, silver and commodities.
snippet: Stocks meandered to a flat close Monday, as investors sought shelter in the traditional havens of gold, silver and commodities.
lead_paragraph: Stocks meandered to a flat close Monday, as investors sought shelter in the traditional havens of gold, silver and commodities as they faced new reports showing weakness in the economy.

headline.main: Stocks Flat as Oil Hits Record
headline.print_headline: The Dollar Falters, Oil Hits a New High and Shares Tread Water
